functions.name: subscription_aad_directory_permit_no_one
functions.description: Ensure no one is permitted in the AAD directory for the subscription.

functions.name: azure_subscription_root_user_no_access_key
functions.description: Ensure the root user of the Azure subscription has no access key assigned.
functions.notes: Remove access keys from root user accounts.

functions.name: subscription_root_user_no_access_key
functions.description: Ensure the root user of the subscription has no access key assigned.
functions.notes: Audit and remove access keys from root user accounts.
